response.original_title: White Gardenia- John Calvin and Other Excerpts From The King James Bible
response.overview: White Gardenia John Calvin and Other Excerpts From the King James Bible features selections from the underground horror project "White Gardenia- The King James Bible" (from the filmmakers/ creators behind "A Dream of Virtual Perfume In the House of Chanel"). Featuring segments and contributions from Daniel Valient, Vivian Kay Quintero, CoffinBirth, Marian Dora, Blucifer, Brock Bones, Christian Michelsen, Nathanael Johns, Sierra Gallagher, Bridger Tone, Bill Cate, Peter Lankston, Shio Motarasu Mono, Wayne Coyne, Jacob B Green, Daniel Zander, and Cory DeAn Cowley.
response.title: White Gardenia- John Calvin and Other Excerpts From The King James Bible
